checks.name: Node Readiness
checks.description: Checks if all nodes are in Ready state

checks.name: Node Pressure
checks.description: Checks for memory, disk, or PID pressure on nodes

checks.name: Component Status
checks.description: Checks the health of core control-plane components

checks.name: Control Plane Pods
checks.description: Validates that key control-plane pods in kube-system are running

checks.name: Service Configuration
checks.description: Checks if services are properly configured with selectors

checks.name: Network Policy Coverage
checks.description: Checks if namespaces have network policies for security
recommendations: Implement network policies for better security isolation

checks.name: DNS Configuration
checks.description: Checks DNS service availability

checks.name: Persistent Volume Health
checks.description: Checks if persistent volumes are in healthy state

checks.name: PVC Binding
checks.description: Checks if persistent volume claims are properly bound

checks.name: Storage Class Configuration
checks.description: Checks storage class setup and default configuration
recommendations: Configure appropriate storage classes and set one as default

issues.description: No default storage class configured
issues.recommendation: Configure a default storage class for automatic PV provisioning

checks.name: Resource Requests
checks.description: Checks if containers have resource requests configured
recommendations: Configure resource requests for better pod scheduling

checks.name: Resource Limits
checks.description: Checks if containers have resource limits configured
recommendations: Configure resource limits to prevent resource exhaustion

checks.name: Complete Resource Configuration
checks.description: Checks if containers have both requests and limits configured
recommendations: Configure both requests and limits for optimal resource management

checks.name: TLS certificate expiry
checks.description: Lists TLS certificates from Secrets (type kubernetes.io/tls) with expiry and days until expiry. Control-plane certs (apiserver/etcd/kubelet) require node-level checks (e.g. kubeadm cert check-expiry).
checks.details: 5 certificate(s); 2 expiring in 90 days, 1 in 30 days, 0 expired.
recommendations: Renew expiring or expired TLS certificates. Update the Secret and restart workloads.
